resources.string: Shows phone usage statistics and trend charts
‚ö†Ô∏è Need %.1fh usage today to achieve goal

‚Ä¢ Automatically aggregates all app usage time except \"Excluded from Stats\"\n‚Ä¢ Apps cannot be manually assigned to this category\n‚Ä¢ This category\'s usage time equals the sum of all other categories
Cloud backup data to prevent loss
Set historical days shown in lock screen widget
View database status and generate test data
To remind you to complete goals and reward/punishment tasks in time, OffTime needs notification permission.
This permission is only used for:
Helping you develop good time management habits
Click OK to enable notification permission.
To display usage time statistics on the lock screen, OffTime needs lock screen widget permission.
Display usage time charts on lock screen
Help you better control phone usage habits
Note: This permission is usually automatically granted during app installation. If shown as not enabled, please manually enable it in the app details page.
Click OK to go to the app details page to check permission status.
To automatically start data statistics services after phone boot, OffTime needs auto-start permission.
Ensure continuity of usage time statistics
Ensure real-time updates of widget data
Note: This permission is usually automatically granted during app installation. If shown as not enabled, please manually enable it in auto-start management.
Click OK to go to the auto-start settings page.
To continuously collect app usage time and update widget data, OffTime needs background running permission.
Continuously collect usage time data in background
Update lock screen widget content in real-time
Ensure goal supervision functions work properly
Note: You need to set OffTime as "Don't optimize" in battery optimization settings to ensure the app can run normally in the background.
Click OK to go to the battery optimization settings page.
To provide vibration reminders when timers end, OffTime needs vibration permission.
Provide reminder functions in silent mode
Note: This permission is usually automatically granted during app installation. If shown as not enabled, please manually enable it in the app details page.
Click OK to go to the app details page to check permission status.
To display overlay reminders, OffTime needs overlay permission.
Note: This permission needs to be manually enabled in system settings.
Click OK to go to the overlay permission settings page.
Use your Google account for secure login and better service experience
By logging in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Please enter a valid account (phone number or username)
Please enter a valid phone number
Password must be at least %d characters
The two passwords do not match
For development testing only, simulates Google login
For development testing only, skips Alipay verification
Use your Alipay account for secure login, no need to remember passwords
‚Ä¢ Supports Alipay and WeChat Pay\n‚Ä¢ One-time purchase, lifetime access\n‚Ä¢ 30-day money-back guarantee
‚Ä¢ Secure payment via Google Play\n‚Ä¢ One-time purchase, lifetime access\n‚Ä¢ Subject to Google Play refund policy
Set daily usage goals and completion rewards/punishments
Record offline activity duration, cultivate healthy habits
Set task reminders and manage time
AppCategory_Users - View all app category configurations
app_settings - View global settings (default categories, reward switches)
summary_usage_user - View daily usage time summary
summary_usage_week_user - View weekly usage time summary
summary_usage_month_user - View monthly usage time summary
daily_usage_user - View daily usage time statistics
By date - View app usage details for all dates
reward_punishment_week_user - View weekly reward record summary
reward_punishment_month_user - View monthly reward record summary
goals_reward_punishment_users - View goal and reward settings
timer_sessions_users - View offline activity timer records
Comprehensive analysis - Automatically diagnose common issues
Data repair - Detect and fix inconsistencies between raw and aggregated data
Screen adaptation - View current device scaling factor information
UI testing - Verify refactored PieChart component functionality
Permission check - Diagnose data collection and permission issues
New feature - Test real-time statistics and smart merge functionality
Service monitoring - Check minute-by-minute auto-update service status
Data repair - Detect and fix anomalous data with over 60 minutes per hour in charts
Select a data table to debug and view detailed information and data content
Select a data table to debug and view detailed information and data content
reward_punishment_week_user - View weekly reward record summary
reward_punishment_month_user - View monthly reward record summary
Choose the number of historical days displayed in the lock screen widget line chart
Please upgrade to premium to continue using
After trial period ends, pay a one-time fee of 9.9 yuan for permanent access to all features
Login to sync data to cloud
Scan chart data for the last 7 days to detect if single-hour usage exceeds 60 minutes
Automatically correct anomalous data exceeding 60 minutes to the 60-minute limit
Cause of anomalies: Usually due to cumulative errors in cross-period session splitting algorithms
Data safety: The repair process only adjusts anomalous data without affecting normal data
No reward obtained in this period for %1$s
No punishment executed in this period for %1$s
üåü You can use %1$sh today, keep it up!
‚ö†Ô∏è Need to use %1$sh today to meet goal
‚úÖ Can still use %1$sh, keep it up!
üéâ Goal achieved and exceeded by %1$sh, amazing!
‚Ä¢ Display all applications in edit mode
‚Ä¢ Click üö´ button to quickly exclude applications
‚Ä¢ Click edit button to change category

Shows usage time statistics for each category.

‚Ä¢ Today/Yesterday: Current day usage time
‚Ä¢ Week: This week's cumulative usage time
‚Ä¢ Month: This month's cumulative usage time

Time format: hours(h) and minutes(m), e.g., 1h30m means 1 hour 30 minutes.

Shows goal completion status for each category.

‚Ä¢ First line: Completed count : Total goal count
‚Ä¢ Second line: Completion percentage

Goal calculation:
‚Ä¢ Yesterday: Fixed as 1 (yesterday 1 day)
‚Ä¢ Week: Days passed (excluding today)
‚Ä¢ Month: Days passed (excluding today)
‚Ä¢ All: All recorded days

Special cases:
‚Ä¢ Monday/Month start shows 100% completion when denominator is 0
‚Ä¢ Colors: Green(100%), Orange(50-99%), Red(<50%)

Shows app usage time change trends.

‚Ä¢ üìà Most Increased: Apps with increased usage time compared to previous period
‚Ä¢ üìâ Most Decreased: Apps with decreased usage time compared to previous period

Comparison description:
‚Ä¢ Today vs Yesterday
‚Ä¢ Yesterday vs Day before
‚Ä¢ Week vs Last week
‚Ä¢ Month vs Last month

Display format: ‚ñ≤103m means increased 103 minutes, +15% means 15% growth

Shows app usage time ranking.

‚Ä¢ Sorted by average daily usage time
‚Ä¢ ü•áü•àü•â represent top three
‚Ä¢ Shows app name, category and usage time

Time period description:
‚Ä¢ Today/Yesterday: Current day usage time
‚Ä¢ Week/Month: Average daily usage time
‚Ä¢ All: Average daily usage time for all recorded time

Click "Show All" to view more app rankings.

Shows reward completion status for each category in different time periods.

‚Ä¢ Yesterday: Yesterday's reward completion
‚Ä¢ Week: Cumulative from Monday to today
‚Ä¢ Month: Cumulative from 1st to today
‚Ä¢ All: All since records began

Click category buttons to view specific reward counts and content. Category button shows reward completion statistics below.

Shows punishment completion status for each category in different time periods.

‚Ä¢ Yesterday: Yesterday's punishment completion
‚Ä¢ Week: Cumulative from Monday to today
‚Ä¢ Month: Cumulative from 1st to today
‚Ä¢ All: All since records began

Click category buttons to view specific punishment counts and content. Category button shows punishment completion statistics below.
No category data. Please add categories on the category page.
Let us help you set up the app and start managing your phone usage time.
Usage stats, app list, notification permissions
Scan and categorize your apps intelligently
Finish setup and start managing your time

‚Ä¢ Dates before installation are shown as gray dashed lines ‚Ä¢ Dates after installation are shown as colored solid lines ‚Ä¢ Even if usage time is 0, a colored solid line will be shown ‚Ä¢ The more days, the denser the chart; it is recommended to choose an appropriate number of days
Used to collect app usage stats
App list permission for below Android 11
Helps you develop good time management habits
Remind yesterday goal completion every morning
Remind to complete reward/punishment tasks every evening
Completed tasks are not reminded again
Focus on helping users manage phone usage time and cultivate healthy digital living habits
